notes:
Appeared during [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary|Tibia's 15th]] and [[Tibia's 20th Anniversary|20th Anniversary]] celebrations as well as on January 7 and 8, 2018 (unintended), in a raid at a random time once a day.
The following message will appear:
{{Server Message|A troll is happily trolling the Orc Fortress - somebody call the CMs!}}
Then, 20 minutes later she will spawn:
{{Server Message|Mirade and Rejana have assumed control of the Orc Fortress!}}
sounds: Tjured! Hand me down the troll repellent CM spray!
I feel I was denied critical need-to-know information.
history: During [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary]], Mirade used to spawn on the plains south of [[Thais]] around {{Mapper Coords|126.81|126.79|7|1|text=here}} with [[Rejana (Creature)|Rejana]] and [[Tjured (Creature)|Tjured]]. She was also immune to [[Physical Damage|Physical]] and [[Magical Damage]]s. Due to a bug, she could originally combo about 800 damage until adjustments were made.
name: Mirade (Creature)
